alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 18 at 5:13PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR KAUAI NIIHAU OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI LANAI AND KAHOOLAWE THROUGH WEDNESDAY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH WEDNESDAY NIGHT... ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...The Big Island. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban and leeward areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Conditions will be favorable for the development of heavy showers and thunderstorms tonight through Wednesday night. The heaviest rain is expected over the slopes of the Kau and Puna Districts.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
